attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government and related departments should do better checks on potentially 'sane' people regarding letting them loose in the community and taking on jobs they are clearly not capable of. Too many 'crazy legs cranes' and 'foghorn leghorns' are slipping through the cracks and us normal people have to put up with it!  Please Mr Prime Minister stop these Crazy Legs Cranes!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
